description: Master the rush hour by managing elevators to transport passengers to their target floors in a race against time.
rationale: This game targets fans of time-management and logistics puzzles. It challenges the player's prioritization skills and reaction speed, providing a clean environment for AI agents to learn optimal scheduling and pathfinding algorithms.
details: The game consists of a building with 5 floors and 2 elevators. Passengers appear on random floors with a specific destination floor indicated above their heads. The player must move elevators to the passenger's floor, pick them up, and deliver them to their destination. Each elevator has a capacity limit of 3 passengers. Points are awarded for successful deliveries, and the game speed increases over time. If a passenger waits too long (indicated by a color-changing timer), they disappear and the player loses a life. The game ends when all lives are lost.

technical_specs.state_space: Elevator positions, passenger locations, passenger destinations, wait timers, current capacity.

how_to_play: Goal: Deliver passengers to their target floors to earn points. Controls: Use 'W/S' keys to move the left elevator and 'Up/Down' arrows to move the right elevator. Elevators automatically pick up and drop off passengers when stopping at a floor where a passenger is waiting or needs to exit. Scoring: +100 points per delivery. Penalty: Lose 1 life if a passenger's wait timer reaches zero.
